subject: Problem with my main control box
description_text:
Hi,

I have Simsonn pedals and my old main control box broke down and need a new
one!
Is this gonna work for me?

Link is Aliexpress sellers.
https://www.aliexpress.com/item/1005009196339656.html?spm=a2g0o.tesla.0.0.6806fqp5fqp5bC&pdp_npi=6%40dis%21USD%21%2466.99%21%2434.83%21%21%21%21%21%4021039a5b17620977985162547e807b%2112000048264072591%21btfpre%21%21%21%211%210%21&afTraceInfo=1005009196339656__pc__c_ppc_item_bridge_pc_related_wf__nCPGRq8__1762097798771


Including picture of my control box (older one)

<https://www.avast.com/sig-email?utm_medium=email&utm_source=link&utm_campaign=sig-email&utm_content=webmail>
Ei
viruksia.www.avast.com
<https://www.avast.com/sig-email?utm_medium=email&utm_source=link&utm_campaign=sig-email&utm_content=webmail>
<#DAB4FAD8-2DD7-40BB-A1B8-4E2AA1F9FDF2>

conversations.body_text: Hi Ville Prusila,  Could you please let us know what issue you’re experiencing with the motherboard? Please provide your order number so we can check it for you.

Hi, Pedals won’t connect anymore.. i think the problem is usb-b port because its moving a little.. I don’t have order number because these are seconhand pedals I have the original box i guess but it’s all chinese language so I dont know what does it says Regards Ville Prusila support@simsonn.com kirjoitti 3.11.2025 kello 3.11: ﻿ 
 Hi Ville Prusila, Could you please let us know what issue you’re experiencing with the motherboard? Please provide your order number so we can check it for you.

Hi, This is pretty much it… dont know if this helps at all but i can send you a picture of the package as soon as i get home Terveisin Ville Prusila support@simsonn.com kirjoitti 3.11.2025 kello 3.11: ﻿ 
 Hi Ville Prusila, Could you please let us know what issue you’re experiencing with the motherboard? Please provide your order number so we can check it for you.
Hi Ville Prusila,  If the connection of your control box feels a bit loose, please try securing the USB port with a cable tie to see if it works properly.

I tried it and didn’t work.. Should this newer main control box work for all simsonn pedals? Terveisin Ville Prusila support@simsonn.com kirjoitti 3.11.2025 kello 7.58: ﻿ 
 
 Hi Ville Prusila, If the connection of your control box feels a bit loose, please try securing the USB port with a cable tie to see if it works properly. 
 
 
 
 
 On
 Mon, 3 Nov at 12:24 AM
 , Ville Prusila <villeprsl@gmail.com> wrote:
 Hi, 
 
 This is pretty much it… dont know if this helps at all but i can send you a picture of the package as soon as i get home 
 
 
 Terveisin Ville Prusila 
 
 
 support@simsonn.com kirjoitti 3.11.2025 kello 3.11: 
 
 
 ﻿ 
 Hi Ville Prusila, Could you please let us know what issue you’re experiencing with the motherboard? Please provide your order number so we can check it for you.
Hi Ville Prusila,  The Plus X control box can be used with our previous-generation pedals.

Hi,

Here is the package can you confirm from this that the new control box will work for me?


Regards 

Ville Prusila

> support@simsonn.com kirjoitti 3.11.2025 kello 11.15:
> 
> ﻿
> Hi Ville Prusila,
> 
> The Plus X control box can be used with our previous-generation pedals. 
> 
> 
>
Hi Ville Prusila,  All older SIMSONN pedals are compatible with the PlusX controller.
